name: I Am Not Meaningless
description:
This is a text adventure game.

I've never made a full game before, so this was really new and exciting for me!

Some scenes will require you press only the actions at the bottom-right of the screen. Other scenes will let you navigate around with the buttons on the bottom-left.

Note: This game contains some dark plot points. If you don't like dark stories, please take caution when playing.

Consider downloading the game if you want the images to load faster!

(To play downloaded version, open index.html in a browser)
